answers.answer: I'm 39 weeks and since I hit around 37 I have gotten swollen hands and feet when I'm warm or walking lots, I don't think it's preeclampsia, I had to take off my ring because my hands started getting swollen

Sounds pretty normal to me..I would swell pretty bad with my first and it would itch but would go down when I would relax and heat will definitely make you swell! You are going to start swelling more since you're in the last few weeks..good luck you're almost done!

question: My feet and hands are starting to swell more often now. Im 37 weeks. The swelling goes down when I get off my feet. And the heat doesn't help so I try to cool down. Is this a normal pregnancy thing? My feet are also itchy. Not severe tho.My blood pressure has been fine & urine fine as well... Could it still be preclampsia if those two things have been normal?
title: itchy, swollen feet... preclampsia??
